SEARCH
Package gw.cc.policy.entity

Interface Coverage

All Known Subinterfaces:
PolicyCoverage, PropertyCoverage, RUCoverage, VehicleCoverage
public interface Coverage
Coverage Insurance coverage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Incident
    findOrCreateIncident(ExposureType exposureType)
    If this coverage relates to a particular vehicle or property AND the Exposure is of type which can contain vehicle or fixed property incident then get the associated vehicle or fixed property incident.
    void
    setCurrency(Currency value)
    Sets the value of the Currency field.
    void
    setPolicy(Policy value)
    Sets the value of the Policy field.

  • Method Details

    • findOrCreateIncident

      Incident findOrCreateIncident(ExposureType exposureType)
      If this coverage relates to a particular vehicle or property AND the Exposure is of type which can contain vehicle or fixed property incident then get the associated vehicle or fixed property incident. If there is no such incident then create a new one. Otherwise return null.
      Parameters:
      exposureType - the type of exposure we are trying to find an incident for
      Returns:
      the incident that is related to this coverage, or the newly created one

    • setCurrency

      void setCurrency(Currency value)
      Sets the value of the Currency field.

    • setPolicy

      void setPolicy(Policy value)
      Sets the value of the Policy field.
